DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: A name used to identify or qualify the constraint relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: A description that may apply additional information about the constraint relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingConstraint
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constraint with which the other Constraints referenced by attribute RelatedConstraints are related.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedConstraints
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constraints that are related with the RelatingConstraint.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance to which the relation RelatingConstraint points shall not be the same as the RelatedConstraint.
